<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IndexOperandHashes;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/stablefunctionmaprecord/#ac0e73c819aeb5a427bd161d0465f073e"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/stablefunctionmaprecord/#aa6d6f1cad87cc3ed7f87784dd9ddff0f">StableFunctionMapRecord::serialize</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;OS)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/stablefunctionmaprecord/#aa6d6f1cad87cc3ed7f87784dd9ddff0f">serialize</a>(OS, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/stablefunctionmaprecord/#a6eadb49468a17cf63d04cfe7a47dc396">FunctionMap</a>.get());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/stablefunctionmaprecord/#aa6d6f1cad87cc3ed7f87784dd9ddff0f"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/stablefunctionmaprecord/#aa6d6f1cad87cc3ed7f87784dd9ddff0f">StableFunctionMapRecord::serialize</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;OS,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="normal">                                        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/stablefunctionmap">StableFunctionMap</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/stablefunctionmaprecord/#a6eadb49468a17cf63d04cfe7a47dc396">FunctionMap</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/support/endian/writer">support::endian::Writer</a> Writer(OS, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae1e26e57357947b25e392fd18ab000dbaaae6635e044ac56046b2893a529b5114">endianness::little</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Write Names.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Names = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/stablefunctionmaprecord/#a6eadb49468a17cf63d04cfe7a47dc396">FunctionMap</a>-&gt;getNames();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint32&#95;t ByteSize = 4;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="normal">  Writer.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/support/endian/writer/#a16a69d4248bb11c84536099421ea833b">write</a>&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;(Names.size());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Name : Names) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal">    Writer.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/support/endian/writer/#aea6f1003a6933f07d06dbce84a8f26cb">OS</a> &lt;&lt; Name &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;\\0&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="normal">    ByteSize += Name.size() + 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Align ByteSize to 4 bytes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint32&#95;t Padding = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a99cdcecbadc13087f087c61809bb44f1">offsetToAlignment</a>(ByteSize, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>(4));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; Padding; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/stablefunctionmaprecord/#a46fcb6ab7d4a17276796efb4fd9ef091"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/stablefunctionmaprecord/#a46fcb6ab7d4a17276796efb4fd9ef091">StableFunctionMapRecord::deserialize</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">char</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a11dbf501abf829b3ab7049c2d3a8a053">Ptr</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Assert that Ptr is 4-byte aligned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(((uintptr&#95;t)<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a11dbf501abf829b3ab7049c2d3a8a053">Ptr</a> % 4) == 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Read Names.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumNames =</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Early exit if there is no name.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; NumNames; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a11dbf501abf829b3ab7049c2d3a8a053">Ptr</a> += Name.size() + 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/stablefunctionmaprecord/#a6eadb49468a17cf63d04cfe7a47dc396">FunctionMap</a>-&gt;getIdOrCreateForName(Name);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Align Ptr to 4 bytes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a11dbf501abf829b3ab7049c2d3a8a053">Ptr</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">uint8&#95;t &#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#afff5074588f0423a669618a7134e13ec">alignAddr</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a11dbf501abf829b3ab7049c2d3a8a053">Ptr</a>, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>(4)));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Read StableFunctionEntries.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/stablefunctionmaprecord/#a6eadb49468a17cf63d04cfe7a47dc396">FunctionMap</a>-&gt;getNameForId(FunctionNameId) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumIndexOperandHashes =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#ae6c58c37f5229487e86ce915afe1ba12">endian::readNext&lt;uint32&#95;t, endianness::little, unaligned&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a11dbf501abf829b3ab7049c2d3a8a053">Ptr</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IndexOperandHashMap = std::make&#95;unique&lt;IndexOperandHashMapType&gt;();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> J = 0; J &lt; NumIndexOperandHashes; ++J) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> InstIndex =</Highlight></CodeLine>
